description: Square array A(n, k), n, k >= 0, read by upwards antidiagonals; if Newton's method applied to the complex function f(z) = z^3 - 1 and starting from n + k*i reaches or converges to exp(2*r*i*Pi/3) for some r in 0..2, then A(n, k) = r, otherwise A(n, k) = -1 (where i denotes the imaginary unit).
